Title: Shijin no Shougai
Description: ['A worker is fired from a factory for demanding a wage increase. His mother, worn thin by poverty, is caught in her own spinning wheel. Then a strange storm buries the town in snow, freezing rich and poor alike. Another short film by Kihachiro Kawamoto']
Related: ['Adaptation: Kidou Senshi Gundam-san', 'Other: Mobile Suit Gundam-san']
